section.name: OpenUSS - The Free University Support System
section.p:
The University Support System OpenUSS offeres a webbased Distribution of E-Learning Materials, provides a discussion group plattform and a chat area. With newsletter services you are able to recieve mails or SMS.
The E-Learning Competence Center supports you during the Introduction and Usage of the E-Learning Plattform OpenUSS. With our support service your individual needs stand on the first place. For instance depending on your needs we will offer you a customized web appearance in OpenUSS. We also offer user trainings on the Usage of OpenUSS for students, teachers and administrators. As an Open Source Componentbased Plattform we design and develop new functionalities based on your needs. We offer additionaly traings for developers on how to develop your own OpenUSS component.

The OpenUSS concept is based on the ASP (Application Service Provider) model, which means that one or more organizations (Universities, Schools, Communities or even Companies) can be handled within one instance of OpenUSS. It gives users the flexibility to use there choosen appliances - the so called multichannel information delivery - to access the OpenUSS instance. The relaunch of OpenUSS with the poject name 'PLEXUS' will support every functionallity within OpenUSS using the latest state of the art technologies like mda support, supporting frameworks like MyFaces, Spring and Hibernate just to mention the big ones.
To contact us just send us an email to our competence center.
